original: Chop the carrots into pieces about 2 centimeters in length.
Peel the potatoes and cut them into 1 cm thick slices.
The zucchini should be thinly sliced approximately 3 cm wide.
Dice the bell peppers into squares measuring 2 centimeters on each side.
Roll out the dough into a rectangle 30 cm in length.
Spread the frosting evenly over the cake leaving a 2 cm border.
Cut the pastry sheet into 8 equal squares each 10 cm by 10 cm.
Form the dough into small balls approximately 4 cm in diameter.
